EmailRoutingAddress.name: EmailRoutingAddress
EmailRoutingAddress.description: An email address used for Email-to-Case. Email routing addresses store a unique email services address provided by Salesforce and configuration options for emails received by this address.

PersonalName.description: The display name of the EmailRoutingAddress. Maximum size is 300 characters.

Address.description: The email address to which your customers direct their questions. Emails are forwarded from this address.

EmailServicesAddress.description: A unique, Salesforce-generated email address. This field value is read-only and can't be modified. Emails are forwarded to this address.
